availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Joseph Rabbeth (Louisville, Kentucky, grocer, telegraph operator, and clerk.)

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, grocer, telegraph operator, and clerk. Native of England. Married to Ann Golder Rabbeth in Kent, England, on June 23, 1830. Father of Margaret Rabbeth, Charlotte Rabbeth, Mathias Rabbeth, John T. Rabbeth, Sidney A. Rabbeth, and Joseph Rabbeth. Immigrated to the United States from England through New York on August 26, 1833. Grocer in Louisville, Kentucky, in 1850. Telegraph operator in Louisville in 1860. Telegraph operator in Louisville in 1861. Clerk of the Western Union Telegraph Company in 1865.
